comments:
This is the sequence of events that can trigger this problem:

1.  JaxRPCMapArtifactEdit.getJaxRPCMapArtifactEditForRead( )
2.  JaxRPCMapArtifactEdit.dispose( ) runs successfully, during dispose, the 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.releaseResour
ces( ) loops 2 times, releasing JaxrpcmapResourceImpl and WebAppResourceImpl 
(both have readReferenceCount=1)
3.  WSDDArtifactEdit.getWSDDArtifactEditForWrite( )
4.  WSDDArtifactEdit.saveIfNecessary( )
5.  WSDDArtifactEdit.dispose( ) fails, during dispose, the 
EditModdel.releaseResources( ) loops 3 times, trying to release 
WsddResourceImpl (readReferenceCount=0, editReferenceCount=1), 
JaxrpcmapResourceImpl (readReferenceCount=1, editReferenceCount=0), 
WebAppResourceImpl (readReferenceCount=0, editReferenceCount=1).  The following 
exception is thrown because of the bad editReferenceCount in 
JaxrpcmapResourceImpl:

IWAB0014E Unexpected exception occured.
  Write reference count error:  
org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.webservice.internal.jaxrpcmap.impl.JaxrpcmapResourceImplpla
tform:/resource/tdjava/tdjavaWP/WebContent/WEB-INF/AddressBook_mapping.xml
      java.lang.RuntimeException: Write reference count error:  
org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.webservice.internal.jaxrpcmap.impl.JaxrpcmapResourceImplpla
tform:/resource/tdjava/tdjavaWP/WebContent/WEB-INF/AddressBook_mapping.xml
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.ReferencedXMIResourceImpl.releaseFr
omWrite(ReferencedXMIResourceImpl.java:197)
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.TranslatorResourceImpl.releaseFromW
rite(TranslatorResourceImpl.java:341)
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.release
(EditModel.java:975)
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.release
(EditModel.java:965)
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.releaseResour
ces(EditModel.java:987)
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emfworkbench.integration.EditModel.releaseAccess
(EditModel.java:949)
      at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.ArtifactEdit.dispose
(ArtifactEdit.java:377)
      at 
com.ibm.etools.webservice.was.creation.ui.command.UpdateWebServicesXmlCommand.ex
ecute(UpdateWebServicesXmlCommand.java:180)
      at 
org.eclipse.wst.command.internal.env.core.fragment.CommandFragmentEngine.runComm
and(CommandFragmentEngine.java:335)
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
